title: Weekly Digest (29 September, 2019 - 6 October, 2019)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 43 issues were created.
Of these, 27 issues have been closed and 16 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #9108 [Proof of account ownership ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9108), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #9107 [Collectibles (except CryptoKitties) are not loaded (endless spinner) after relogin](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9107), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9105 [Suppress back-up-seed prompt when already done (fixes #8938)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9105), by [acolytec3](https://github.com/acolytec3)
:green_heart: #9101 [Restored account for e2e doesn't receive messages from new users](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9101), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9098 [Desktop crashes after account recover in dev mode](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9098), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:green_heart: #9097 [Missed avatar and name on account recover, desktop](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9097), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:green_heart: #9095 [Wrong size of onboarding images on desktop](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9095), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:green_heart: #9094 [Copy update multiaccount: watch account > address](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9094), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #9093 [Error on `share` button press in Status Desktop](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9093), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:green_heart: #9091 [Blank profile screen in Status Desktop](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9091), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:green_heart: #9087 [[#8657] Keyboard overlaps sign button if you tap on sign after changing "Recipient" or "Asset" field on Send Transaction screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9087), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:green_heart: #9086 [keycard pin screen fixes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9086), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:green_heart: #9084 [Improve BIP-39 mnemonic entry experience](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9084), by [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis)
:green_heart: #9081 [Bandwidth usage way too high for limited data plan](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9081), by [oskarth](https://github.com/oskarth)
:green_heart: #9077 [[#8937] Recent stickers are shown when stickers tab is highlighted](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9077), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9075 [Fix ENS input when starting a new chat](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9075), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #9109 [Fix RNGestureHandler version in Podfile.lock](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9109), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:heart: #9106 [Bump @react-native-community/netinfo from 4.2.2 to 4.3.1 in /mobile/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9106), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:heart: #9104 [Test to check cryptokitty in wallet collectibles](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9104), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #9103 [Fix for 2 failed e2e](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9103), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #9102 [Clean package json](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9102), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:heart: #9100 [Bump react-native-gesture-handler from 1.3.0 to 1.4.1 in /desktop/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9100), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:heart: #9099 [Bump react-navigation from 3.11.1 to 3.13.0 in /desktop/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9099), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:heart: #9096 [[Fixes #9088] Store eip1581 path](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9096), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:heart: #9092 [Fixed desktop excessive logging](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9092), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:heart: #9090 [Excessive logging in status desktop](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9090), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:heart: #9089 [Fix api request to etherscan](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9089), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #9088 [Store eip1581 extended key](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9088), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:heart: #9085 [e2e for mobile data sync](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9085), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #9083 [Update the Korean translations](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9083), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:heart: #9082 [fix which APK is published for e2e builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9082), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #9080 [Bump @react-native-community/netinfo from 4.2.2 to 4.3.0 in /mobile/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9080), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:heart: #9079 [Bump react-native-status-keycard from 2.5.11 to 2.5.12 in /mobile/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9079), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:heart: #9078 [[#9055] fix keycard restore](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9078), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:heart: #9076 [Pass username to quoted message](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9076), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:heart: #9074 [[#8934] Only one sticker is shown in "Recently used"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9074), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #9073 [[#8945] "null is not an object" error when tap on sticker sent in chat](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9073), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #9072 [[#8973] Mobile data syncing pop-up missing text](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9072), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #9071 [Quoted messages (replies) contains chat key instead of generated name](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9071), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #9070 [Remove UUID related code #9048](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9070), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #9069 [keycard seed suggestions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9069), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #9068 [[Snyk] Fix for 1 vulnerabilities](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9068), by [snyk-bot](https://github.com/snyk-bot)
:heart: #9067 [Bump react-native-shake from 3.3.1 to 3.4.0 in /mobile/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9067), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #9081 [Bandwidth usage way too high for limited data plan](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9081), by [oskarth](https://github.com/oskarth)
It received :+1: x0, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x4.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #9096 [[Fixes #9088] Store eip1581 path](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9096), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
It received 18 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 36 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 10 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #9105 [Suppress back-up-seed prompt when already done (fixes #8938)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9105), by [acolytec3](https://github.com/acolytec3)
:yellow_heart: #9094 [Copy update multiaccount: watch account > address](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9094), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:yellow_heart: #9087 [[#8657] Keyboard overlaps sign button if you tap on sign after changing "Recipient" or "Asset" field on Send Transaction screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9087), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:yellow_heart: #9086 [keycard pin screen fixes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9086), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:yellow_heart: #9077 [[#8937] Recent stickers are shown when stickers tab is highlighted](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9077), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #9075 [Fix ENS input when starting a new chat](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9075), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:yellow_heart: #9053 [keycard bugfixes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9053), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:yellow_heart: #9052 [[#9025] fix keycard pairings persistence](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9052), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:yellow_heart: #8985 [Fix sticker pack installation buttons](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8985), by [igetgames](https://github.com/igetgames)
:yellow_heart: #8903 [Onboarding ui touchups](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8903), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 26 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #9109 [Fix RNGestureHandler version in Podfile.lock](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9109), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:purple_heart: #9104 [Test to check cryptokitty in wallet collectibles](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9104), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:purple_heart: #9103 [Fix for 2 failed e2e](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9103), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #9102 [Clean package json](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9102), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:purple_heart: #9096 [[Fixes #9088] Store eip1581 path](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9096), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:purple_heart: #9092 [Fixed desktop excessive logging](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9092), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:purple_heart: #9089 [Fix api request to etherscan](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9089), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:purple_heart: #9085 [e2e for mobile data sync](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9085), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #9083 [Update the Korean translations](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9083), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:purple_heart: #9082 [fix which APK is published for e2e builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9082), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #9078 [[#9055] fix keycard restore](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9078), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:purple_heart: #9076 [Pass username to quoted message](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9076), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:purple_heart: #9074 [[#8934] Only one sticker is shown in "Recently used"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9074), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #9073 [[#8945] "null is not an object" error when tap on sticker sent in chat](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9073), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #9072 [[#8973] Mobile data syncing pop-up missing text](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9072), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)

:purple_heart: #9069 [keycard seed suggestions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9069), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #9065 [upgrade Go: 1.11 > 1.12](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9065), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 30 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [upgrade status-go with geth 1.9.5  Signed-off-by: Adam Babik <a.babik@designfortress.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/df874966baf8277386d22a9f59abb7edd251150e) by [adambabik](https://github.com/adambabik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix RNGestureHandler version in Podfile.lock  Signed-off-by: Pedro Pombeiro <pombeirp@users.noreply.github.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/fcfc7f346e1696072291a3d093a7ca03e12e0a4a) by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Test to check cryptokitty in wallet collectibles  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/58c64608d0e2eaef975fa80ef69d9af6df36a9b7) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add currency conversions for signing sheet  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/72867473d03af40636c90767c642288f59da23ca) by [acolytec3](https://github.com/acolytec3)
:hammer_and_wrench: [4 e2e fix  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/4eac209b9b7b1be75be487b3854d30a7a4cb7b08) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[Fixes #9088] Store eip1581 path and wallet root path, don't store master key  When creating the account we store as well the path specified in eip1581 https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-1581.md , `m / 43' / 60' / 1581'`.  The reason for doing so is that eventually we might want to derive an encryption key from it, which would require the user to re-enter their seed phrase if we would not store this.  This commit changes the behavior not to store the master key, and instead store `m /44'/60' /0'/0`, from which wallets are now derived.  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/ba34af0dd45fa256cef59ba640a7eff524dcfef4) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#8966] biometric  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/b3d04bb68c1a11a6d901c30f588c882d3f5fd530) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [mobile_data_tests  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/da4fb01700f8661c82bfdddacc7db7c6940da74b) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Allow Node.js packages to be upgraded by dependabot  - Move dev dependencies to `devDependencies`  Signed-off-by: Pedro Pombeiro <pombeirp@users.noreply.github.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e8627f032028dcca9842d95d228918b0d3498c26) by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Bump react-native-gesture-handler in /desktop/js_filesBumps [react-native-gesture-handler](https://github.com/kmagiera/react-native-gesture-handler) from 1.3.0 to 1.4.1.- [Release notes](https://github.com/kmagiera/react-native-gesture-handler/releases)- [Commits](https://github.com/kmagiera/react-native-gesture-handler/compare/1.3.0...1.4.1)Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com>  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/d753f0d9b12a7383482cd7ee83f0a180b7253fe0) by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:hammer_and_wrench: [update-kr-translations  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/d2a51f9711f1c74c0327fcd076dc1bff5fa32d4f) by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Switched to updated installation packages  Signed-off-by: Volodymyr Kozieiev <vkjr.sp@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/f34012a8154a515f002b8db39526e654e4755446) by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix small UI problems with the compose reply screen  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/78c57a356b56a3f80bb649b223d567a82287afc9) by [alexjg](https://github.com/alexjg)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix api request to etherscan  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/6037add15629c1e278426228f8385d00b93e4bdf) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Desktop works with react-navigation v3  Signed-off-by: Volodymyr Kozieiev <vkjr.sp@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/ace4b5a1618ec40783f4a841ce85953e1015b191) by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix which APK is published for e2e builds  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/599ed980939b5be2fad33c883bda927cc829eb8a) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#9055] fix keycard restore  Signed-off-by: Dmitry Novotochinov <dmitry.novot@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/9f6db66ab6b3f2ecaf2a53dd26538d09b9969ecd) by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add username to quoted message  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/42961f3a0ea92ddb9c0bfe9fce7129de0b7d883f) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Update issue templates  Resolves #9058  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c8b4fdfcd94a543a9a0b44881223b8e9193109ea) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#8934] Only one sticker is shown in "Recently used"  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/9d06f01506fddba9059eecd9f0cc45c2567efeea) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Remove UUID related code #9048  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/371c66aad18820a82e7555970791b5cfba84907e) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#8945] "null is not an object" error when tap on sticker sent in chat  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/f52b87ef2285be6a69d17dd2679a11b1de796b55) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [keycard seed suggestions  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/bedb6a841b5d4e5128efae5c385191472888fb9b) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#8973] Mobile data syncing pop-up missing text  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/7ddebcb815f60044faa0d6fc38503bd6cd96698e) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add `pod-install` Makefile target  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/616489bbf20dbe1f5cb10efb3aed90d36b89bb8b) by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
